default.description: Primary background color for main surfaces, cards, and containers

subtle.description: Subtle background for secondary surfaces, alternating rows, and nested containers

muted.description: Muted background for disabled states and inactive elements

strong.description: Strong background for emphasized sections, headers, and active states

default.description: Primary text color for body content, paragraphs, and general UI text

subtle.description: Secondary text for metadata, timestamps, descriptions, and supporting content

muted.description: Muted text for placeholders, hints, and disabled content

strong.description: Emphasized text for headings, titles, and important content

default.description: Default border color for cards, inputs, dividers, and containers

subtle.description: Subtle borders for light separators, table rows, and minimal dividers

muted.description: Very light borders for gentle visual separation

strong.description: Strong borders for emphasis, active states, and important boundaries

default.description: Default fill color for icons, graphics, and shapes

subtle.description: Subtle fill for secondary icons and decorative elements

muted.description: Muted fill for disabled icons and inactive graphics

strong.description: Strong fill for emphasized icons and primary graphics

default.description: Default outline for focus states and selection indicators

subtle.description: Subtle outline for secondary focus indicators

strong.description: Strong outline for high-emphasis focus states

default.description: Default divider lines between sections and list items

subtle.description: Subtle dividers for minimal visual separation

strong.description: Strong dividers for clear section boundaries

default.description: Default shadow for cards and elevated elements

subtle.description: Subtle shadow for slight elevation

strong.description: Strong shadow for high elevation and modals

default.description: Primary action background for main buttons and CTAs

subtle.description: Subtle action background for secondary buttons and hover states

muted.description: Very light action background for ghost buttons and minimal CTAs

strong.description: Strong action background for emphasized CTAs and critical actions

default.description: Interactive text color for links and text buttons

subtle.description: Subtle interactive text for secondary links

strong.description: Strong interactive text for emphasized links and CTAs

default.description: Border color for outlined buttons and interactive elements

subtle.description: Subtle border for secondary interactive elements

strong.description: Strong border for emphasized interactive elements

default.description: Fill color for interactive icons and action graphics

subtle.description: Subtle fill for secondary action icons

strong.description: Strong fill for emphasized action icons

default.description: Primary focus outline for interactive elements

subtle.description: Subtle focus outline for secondary interactions

strong.description: Strong focus outline for critical interactions

default.description: Divider color within action groups and button sets

subtle.description: Subtle shadow for action elements

strong.description: Strong shadow for floating action buttons

success.description: Background color for success alerts, messages, and positive feedback

warning.description: Background color for warning messages, cautions, and alerts

error.description: Background color for error alerts, validation failures, and critical issues

info.description: Background color for informational banners, tooltips, and help content

success.description: Text color for success messages, positive values, and confirmations

warning.description: Text color for warning labels, caution text, and preventive messages

error.description: Text color for error messages, invalid inputs, and critical alerts

info.description: Text color for help text, tooltips, and informative content

success.description: Border color for valid inputs, success states, and positive feedback

warning.description: Border color for warning inputs, caution states, and alerts

error.description: Border color for invalid inputs, error states, and validation failures

info.description: Border color for info cards, tooltips, and help containers

success.description: Fill color for success icons, checkmarks, and positive indicators

warning.description: Fill color for warning triangles, alert icons, and caution symbols

error.description: Fill color for error circles, X marks, and critical icons

info.description: Fill color for info circles, i icons, and help symbols

success.description: Shadow for success alerts and cards

warning.description: Shadow for warning alerts and cards

error.description: Shadow for error alerts and cards

info.description: Shadow for info alerts and cards

default.description: Brand color for hero sections, marketing elements, and brand expression

subtle.description: Subtle brand background for light accents and secondary brand elements

muted.description: Very light brand background for minimal brand presence

strong.description: Strong brand background for bold brand statements

default.description: Brand color for headlines, emphasis, and brand text

subtle.description: Subtle brand text for secondary brand messaging

strong.description: Strong brand text for maximum brand impact

default.description: Brand color for element outlines and brand borders

subtle.description: Subtle brand borders for light brand elements

strong.description: Strong brand borders for emphasized brand elements

default.description: Brand color for logos, brand icons, and brand graphics

subtle.description: Subtle brand fill for secondary brand graphics

strong.description: Strong brand fill for bold brand elements

default.description: Brand focus outline for brand elements

Brand shadow for elevated brand elements

strong.description: Strong inverse background for maximum contrast

subtle.description: Subtle light text for secondary content on dark

strong.description: Strong light text for emphasis on dark backgrounds

subtle.description: Subtle borders on dark backgrounds

strong.description: Strong borders on dark backgrounds for emphasis

default.description: Light icons and graphics on dark backgrounds

subtle.description: Subtle light fill on dark backgrounds

strong.description: Strong light fill for emphasis on dark

default.description: Light focus outline on dark backgrounds

light.description: Light overlay for subtle backdrop effects

heavy.description: Heavy overlay for strong focus on foreground content

blur.description: Overlay with backdrop blur for glassmorphism effects

modal.description: Background for modal dialogs and drawers

sticky.description: Background for sticky headers and navigation

sunken.description: Background for recessed areas and wells

error.description: Focus ring for elements in error state

default.description: Border color for focused inputs and form elements
Background for selected items in lists and menus

Background for code blocks and terminals
